title: World Manifest
description: Defines the structure for a world manifest file, including metadata, starting conditions, and references to all required content data files for a specific game world.

schemaVersion.description: Version of the world manifest schema this file adheres to (e.g., '1.0.0').

worldName.description: Human-readable name for this game world (e.g., 'Demo Dungeon', 'Tutorial Island').

startingPlayerId.description: The entity ID of the player character definition to use when starting this world.

startingLocationId.description: The entity ID of the location entity where the player character starts.

contentFiles.description: An object containing categorized lists of relative paths to content definition files required for this world.

actions.description: Relative paths to action definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/actions/core_look.action.json'.

events.description: Relative paths to event definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'data/events/move_attempted.event.json'.

entities.description: Relative paths to entity definition files (JSON), typically covering players, NPCs, or other non-item/non-location entities.

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/entities/npcs.json'.
Relative paths to item entity definition files (JSON).
Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/items/weapons.json'.

locations.description: Relative paths to location entity definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/locations/dungeon_level1.json'.

connections.description: Relative paths to connection entity definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/connections/conn_entrance_hallway.connection.json'.

blockers.description: Relative paths to blocker entity definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/blockers/demo_door_exit_north.blocker.json'.

triggers.description: Relative paths to event trigger definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/triggers/level_triggers.json'.

objectives.description: Relative paths to objective definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/objectives/quest1_objectives.json'.

quests.description: Relative paths to quest definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/quests/main_quests.json'.

interactionTests.description: Relative paths to interaction test definition files (JSON).

items.description: Path relative to the world's root directory, e.g., 'content/interaction_tests/door_tests.json'.
